title: #1480 It's Wild Incompetence?
itunes:title: #1480 It's Wild Incompetence?
description:
Adam and Dr. Drew open the show with Adam paying off a tease from the last show about a TV commercial Gavin Newsom ran at the end of his recall election and the wild incompetence it highlights. Drew also harkens back to the ride home from Gina Grad's wedding and gets Adam's take on his experience of the conversations had on that ride. They then turn to the phones and speak to a variety of callers including one who has Covid and is looking for treatment advice and another who wants to thank the guys for the impact they've had on his life. 

Please Support Our Sponsors:
SimpliSafe.com/ADAM2
BlindsGalore.com, tell them Adam sent you
Lifelock.com, promo code ADAM
